basic.description: Topics include: fundamental principles of drug action, autonomic nervous system pharmacology, and toxicology.
basic.subject: PHAR
basic.title: Principles of General Pharmacology I

extra.enrollment_requirement:
PREREQUISITE    PHGY 210/6.0 or PHYG212 or PHGY 214/6.0.
COREQUISITE    BCHM 310/6.0 or BCHM 315/3.0. 
EXCLUSION    No more than 3.0 units from PHAR 340/3.0; PHAR 341/3.0.
